definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Under the Linden Tree, Buddha sat up in the middle and appeared calm.
sentences.chinese: 在菩提树下，佛祖端坐中间，神态安详。

sentences.english: He was sitting on the grass, very peaceful, smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他端坐在玻璃座上，非常安详，面带微笑。

sentences.english: Gray flower climbs quiet on postmeridian white brick and unruffled .
sentences.chinese: 灰色的花爬在午后的白砖上静谧而安详。

sentences.english: O shade, so sedate and decorous by day, with calm countenance and regulated pace;
sentences.chinese: 啊，白日里那么沉着和端庄，状貌安详，步履均匀。

sentences.english: The calm when the blue-black couplet letting a person like ink remembers copy calligraphy and unruffled .
sentences.chinese: 墨水般的深蓝色让人联想起临摹书法时的平静和安详。

sentences.english: We sleep peacefully, dream sweetly and speak freely.
sentences.chinese: 我们安详地睡觉，甜甜地做梦，自由地谈话。

sentences.english: He wore an air of serenity which rendered him singularly venerable.
sentences.chinese: 他神态安详，使他显得异样地庄严可敬。

sentences.english: A mind at peace with all below.
sentences.chinese: 那心灵安详而含蓄蕴藉。

sentences.english: This will help them sleep deeply and peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 这将帮助他们睡得很沉，很安详。

sentences.english: Cathedral and churches possess a serene beauty.
sentences.chinese: 天主教堂和耶稣教堂的美丽宁静而安详。

sentences.english: The procession passes serenely, like a cortege entering the cemetery gates.
sentences.chinese: 它们安详地滑过去，像送葬队列走进公墓大门时那样。

sentences.english: A herd of about 100 African buffalo meanders quietly along a riverbank.
sentences.chinese: 一群非洲水牛，大约100只，安详地顺着河岸漫步。

sentences.english: Countries show promise to do such as yunlang stepmother, such as send peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 国秀答应了如寄给云朗做继母，如寄安详辞世。

sentences.english: Shen Wenbao lived to a ripe old age and died peacefully, without any suffering.
sentences.chinese: 沈文宝活到了很老，安详死去，没有一点痛苦。

sentences.english: The figures, meticulously depicted, all look composed.
sentences.chinese: 人物形态安详，刻画入微。

sentences.english: Horizontal lines appear calm and at rest, because they are parallel to the surface of the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 因为横线与地表平行，所以显得平静安详。

definition: quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
